input_text:
Job Title: Lead Robotics Mechanical engineer

Location: Ridgewood, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Manufacturing, Production

Description:
We are seeking a skilled Robotics Manufacturing Engineer specializing in robotic end effectors to join our dynamic team. As a key member, you will be responsible for designing and developing innovative robotic end effectors for various applications. Your expertise will contribute to the advancement of our robotic systems, enhancing their capabilities and efficiency.
Title: Lead Robotics Manufacturing engineerExperience: 3+ years (in relevant role)Location: Ridgewood NJ - 07450
Responsibilities:End Effector Design: Design and develop robotic end effectors tailored to specific applications, considering factors such as payload capacity, precision, and environmental constraints.Mechanical Engineering: Apply principles of mechanical engineering to create robust and reliable end effector designs. Ensure designs meet performance requirements and adhere to industry standards.Prototyping and Testing: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to prototype end effector designs and conduct thorough testing. Analyze test results to iterate and refine designs for optimal performance.Material Selection: Evaluate and select appropriate materials for end effector components, considering factors such as strength, weight, and durability. Optimize designs for cost-effectiveness without compromising quality.CAD Modeling: Utilize CAD software to create detailed 3D models and technical drawings of end effector assemblies. Generate accurate documentation for manufacturing and assembly processes.Manufacturing Support: Work closely with manufacturing partners to ensure seamless transition from design to production. Provide guidance and support to resolve any manufacturing challenges or issues that arise.Innovation and Improvement: Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends related to robotic end effectors. Continuously seek opportunities to innovate and improve end effector designs for enhanced performance and efficiency.Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate with software engineers, electrical engineers, and other stakeholders to integrate end effectors into robotic systems. Communicate effectively and contribute to a cohesive team environment.
Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related field; Master's degree preferred.Proven experience in mechanical design, specifically in the field of robotic end effectors.Proficiency in CAD software (e.g., SolidWorks, AutoCAD) for 3D modeling and drafting.Strong understanding of mechanical principles and design fundamentals.Experience with prototyping, testing, and iteration of mechanical designs.Knowledge of materials selection and manufacturing processes relevant to robotics.Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Effective communication and teamwork abilities.Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.Passion for robotics and a desire to contribute to the advancement of automation technology.
If you meet the above qualifications and are excited about the opportunity to design cutting-edge robotic end effectors, we encourage you to apply. Join us in shaping the future of robotics and automation.
About Techolution:Techolution is a Product Development firm on track to become one of the most admired brands in the world for "innovation done right". Our purpose is to harness our expertise in novel technologies to deliver more profits for our enterprise clients while helping them deliver a better human experience for the communities they serve. With that, we are now fully committed to helping our clients build the enterprise of tomorrow by making the leap from Lab Grade AI to Real World AI.We are honored to have recently received the prestigious Inc 500 Best In Business award, a testament to our commitment to excellence. While we are big enough to be trusted by some of the greatest brands in the world, we are small enough to care about delivering meaningful ROI-generating innovation at a guaranteed price for each client that we serve.
Let’s give you more insights!One of our amazing products with Artificial Intelligence:1. https://faceopen.com/ : Our proprietary and powerful AI Powered user identification system which is built on artificial intelligence technologies such as image recognition, deep neural networks, and robotic process automation. (No more touching keys, badges or fingerprint scanners ever again!)
Some videos you wanna watch!Computer Vision demo at The AI Summit New York 2023Life at TecholutionGoogleNext 2023Ai4 - Artificial Intelligence Conferences 2023WaWa - Solving Food Wastage Saving lives - Brooklyn HospitalInnovation Done Right on Google CloudTecholution featured on Worldwide Business with KathyIrelandTecholution presented by ION World’s Greatest
Visit us @www.techolution.com : To know more about our revolutionary core practices and getting to know in detail about how we enrich the human experience with technology.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
